resources.string:
Be always yourself –
That’s your sacral lesson.
Fill yourself with the Mother Earth’s
power Fly with your thoughts
any hour.
Reach out to stars and long-cherished
goals, Unveil your talents, save
human souls.
Achieve recognition and glory
And write your own magic story!
You are a person holding a burning torch of Divine Love! God has given you wondermaking skills. Make sure to always remember this, knowing how to develop and implement them, doing good to a lot of people who come your way. There is a mark of the Divine Star in your destiny. You are truly God’s miracle, for God is inside of you and He is a miracle! You have a power of thought and mind and the Earth’s Power is in you. Any thought is followed by materializing energy, that is of the action. Develop your skills and share them with people! Whenever you follow the energy of your destiny, you feel uplifted, inspired, you are in the state of joy and happiness. Everything feels good and your eyes sparkle. You look beautiful and attractive because beauty comes from within like the glow of Divine Love. Things start to look friendly and wonderful. And they really are, since you got in tune in with your own unique flow, which only you can understand and feel blended with. It has covered you like a true friend and helper would and it will stay by your side forever if you let it: stand by you, fulfil you, light you, love you and make you happy. This is you and this is the Divine in you. Reach out your hand and an Angel’s feather will fall in it from the Heaven. Right there you will know– God is with you!
You’re the magician in your mind,
You are the one in all you do–
Magician: God-send, wise and
kind.
In dreams you dream you’re really true.
You bring out a brand new life
Carrying inside creative light,
You play your own little fife;
You paint the world a miraculous sight!
It is crucial for you to understand that you were born the blessed magician and that you’re truly the one, for the Universe gave you this quality at birth. Be sure to always remember this, learn to control the power of your mind and start thinking positively, to see the Divine in everyday life, in those everyday little things. We need to learn to grasp signs of Higher Forces on our life path. Learn to never limit your thoughts and God in you, and, consequently, stop doubting. You should learn to have faith in unconditional miracles. Those are magicians who has not doubted a miracle once! Then miracles will become a normal part of your life, or, let’s put it simply, the presence and guidance of the Divine will always be there with you! Wherever you are and whatever you do – remember about your wonderworking star, for you are the Magician!
Take good care of your physical body for it is the Temple of the Spirit. Wonders can happen only in a pure, light- and energy-filled temple. Remember that and take care of yourself. You are capable of bringing good into many people’s lives! Fear nothing and doubt no intentions of yours to come true. Be firm and decisive, be proactive, and luck will definitely come your way for you are the Magician! Call Higher Forces to action to help you out with fulfilling your intentions more often! Learn how to practice meditations, prayers and rituals.

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
Remember that the road to fulfilling your destiny lies through healing your negative qualities connected with this energy. First, what we need to do is spring-clean our karmic blockages in our lives, and then the water of our life river starts flowing!
